description: This veal shoulder pot roast is a one pot wonder with minimal stress. ask your butcher to roll and tie the joint for you.
name: Veal & Root Vegetable Pot Roast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the casserole from the oven, add the carrots and parsnips and cook for 1 hour without the lid, until the veal is completely tender. Serve the veal sliced with carrots, parsnips and pan juices drizzled on top.
